title: Yatri - Book Autos & Cabs
description:
Available in Delhi, Gurugram, Noida, Jaipur, Chandigarh & Kerala (Kochi, Trivandrum, Thrissur & Kozhikode).

Yatri is a community initiative that provides hassle-free auto & cab booking experience for its customers. Built with feedback from drivers & customers, the app strives to build a sustainable, long-term, and transparent mobility solution. 

Whether it's an easy commute to the office or a quick pick-up for a weekend hangout, Namma Yatri has got you covered with its autos & cabs!

The Yatri Difference

- Yatri charges its drivers zero commission! This means you pay less and the driver earns more - it’s magic!
- 100% payment goes directly to the driver without any cuts or any middlemen
- It is already India’s most ❤️ app, loved by drivers and customers alike
- We only assign trips to drivers nearby so you get lightning fast bookings and your assigned driver reaches your location in no time
- Our drivers are super happy, and hence you will experience lower cancellations and, thus, happy rides.
- All our data is 100% Open. Check it out at https://www.getyatri.com/open/

Booking autos & cabs has never been this easy & hassle-free!

Feature highlights

🛺🚕 Quick and easy booking: Install - Signup - Book- Pay & Repeat, you can book a ride to come at your doorstep.
🛺🚕 Fast, Easy & Safe: Find an auto or cab ride easily with a few taps on your mobile and enjoy a hassle-free ride.
🛺🚕 Save your favourite locations: You no longer need to set the location every time you book a ride; you can pick it up from your marked locations without hassle.
🛺🚕 Repeat Ride: Book your office ride every day without hassle. Click on "Repeat ride" instead of entering your pickup and drop location all over again.
🛺🚕 Navigation and Real-time tracking: Track your ride in realtime and know exactly when your ride will arrive, with the best-in-class maps technology.
🛺🚕 Affordable fares: Our fares are fair and affordable, so you don't have to worry about overpaying for your ride. No haggling. No bargaining. No waste of time.
🛺🚕 Direct Payment: Pay directly to the Driver in cash or UPI.
🛺🚕 100% Transparency: No hidden charges; you can check the rate card to know the breakdown of your ride fare.
🛺🚕 Multiple languages to choose from – Access Yatri in English, Hindi, Malayalam languages.

How to book an auto/cab through Yatri app

✅ Download Yatri auto/cab booking app
✅ Signup on the app with your phone number
✅ Pick your drop location and then confirm your pickup location
✅ Let us assign the nearest driver
✅ Start your ride
✅ Pay the driver directly through cash or UPI, at the end of the trip

Follow us on our social media platforms and stay updated:
Instagram: https://instagram.com/yatri.delhi
Instagram: https://instagram.com/yatri.kerala

summary: Zero Commission Rides - Low Cancellations, Fast Pickups & Affordable Fares.
